title: FTC Team Captain
description: Led a multidisciplinary robotics team competing in FIRST Tech Challenge, achieving top-tier performance globally while mentoring the next generation of engineers.
highlights: Earned 25+ awards including Think, Design, and Connect Awards
Mentored 20+ students in mechanical design and programming
Reached 5,000+ youth through outreach and community engagement
Led mechanical design and autonomous software development
Grew team from 8 to 15+ members across multiple disciplines

title: Director of Encoder Development
description: Leading R&D for high-precision encoder systems specifically designed for FTC odometry applications, focusing on manufacturable designs with comprehensive documentation.
highlights: Designed high-precision encoder for FTC odometry applications
Refined interfaces for optimal integration with existing systems
Developed manufacturable design with comprehensive documentation
Collaborated with manufacturing team to ensure production feasibility

title: Student
description: Pursuing dual degree in Aerospace Engineering and Computer Science with focus on autonomous systems and robotics applications.
highlights: Aerospace Engineering and Computer Science double major
Coursework in control systems, flight dynamics, and software engineering
Active in robotics research and development projects
